pesticide.PPE: Coveralls over short-sleeved shirt and short pants; Chemical-resistant footwear plus socks; Chemical-resistant gloves made of any waterproof material; Protective eyewear (goggles or face shield); Chemical-resistant headgear for overhead exposure

Safety_Information.general_Info: Corrosive. Causes irreversible eye damage. DO NOT get in eyes or on clothing. Harmful if swallowed. Causes skin irritation. DO NOT get on skin or on clothing. Wash hands thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco, or using the toilet. Remove and wash contaminated clothing before reuse.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eyes open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15 - 20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. DO NOT give any liquid to the person. DO NOT induce vomiting unless told to by a poison control center or doctor. DO NOT give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15 - 20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Probable mucosal damage may contraindicate the use of gastric lavage. Contains petroleum distillate. May pose an aspiration pneumonia hazard.
